item.title: Lc03_æ— é‡å¤å­—ç¬¦çš„æœ€é•¿å­ä¸²
item.description: åŒæŒ‡é’ˆç»å…¸æ¨¡æ¿ï¼š class Solution { public: int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) { unordered_map<int, int> hash; int res = 0; for (int l = 0, r = 0; r < s.size(); r ++) { hash[s[r]] ++; while (hash[s[r]] > 1) hash[s[l ++]] --; if (res < r - l + 1) res = r - l + 1; } return res; } };
